short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add health checks for your services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add quick accessibility checks for your web applications within the network from your work browser and get notified if your application has accessibility issues with alerts on your desktop.
